title: Jazz Unveils Garaj 24/7 and Quantica Infinity IoT
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 30 (APP):Jazz, Pakistan’s leading digital operator, has announced the launch of two transformative platforms—Garaj 24/7, a locally hosted collaboration suite developed in partnership with IceWarp, and Quantica Infinity, a comprehensive Internet of Things (IoT) platform designed to fast-track smart automation across industries.
According to a news release unveiled at a high-profile event in Karachi, this dual launch underscores Jazz’s commitment to local innovation, data sovereignty, and the creation of intelligent digital infrastructure for Pakistan.
Garaj 24/7 addresses the growing need for agile operations, data security, and seamless collaboration in today’s connected business environment. It offers a comprehensive productivity suite comprising business email, real-time document co-authoring, secure team messaging, video conferencing, and full support across mobile and desktop platforms.
Developed in collaboration with IceWarp and hosted entirely within Pakistan, Garaj 24/7 guarantees data sovereignty, regulatory compliance, and low-latency performance—critical for enterprise-grade workloads.
The platform serves as a credible local alternative to global platforms, with the added benefits of predictable pricing, localized support, and no data egress risks. As part of the broader Garaj Cloud portfolio, Garaj 24/7 reflects Jazz’s asset-light strategy, empowering enterprises to scale efficiently while staying in control of their data and operations.
Quantica – Jazz’s unified business platform for IoT, marketing, analytics, communications, and consulting – has launched Infinity, an advanced IoT platform developed in collaboration with DynaSys to support the next phase of smart innovation in Pakistan. Combining robust digital infrastructure with a scalable architecture, Infinity is designed to simplify the deployment of connected solutions across a wide range of sectors.
From smart agriculture and sustainable cities to utility services and intelligent fleet management, Infinity is tailored to address the evolving needs of modern Pakistan. With multiple real-world use cases, it empowers businesses and public institutions alike to operate smarter, faster, and more efficiently. By enabling seamless automation, actionable insights, and connected intelligence, Infinity places innovation at the center of Pakistan’s economic growth story.
Asif Aziz, President Enterprise Solutions, Jazz, said, “Pakistan’s digital future depends on platforms that are not only innovative but sovereign, scalable, and secure. With Garaj 24/7 and Quantica Infinity IoT, we’re equipping local enterprises with the tools they need to collaborate smarter, automate confidently, and build solutions aligned with our national digital ambitions.”
This launch marks a significant milestone in Jazz’s evolution into a ServiceCo—moving beyond connectivity to offer integrated digital platforms that enhance lives and drive inclusive economic growth. Jazz now serves over 100 million users across a growing ecosystem that includes fintech (JazzCash), entertainment (Tamasha), digital self-care (SIMOSA), InsurTech (FikrFree), enterprise cloud solutions (Garaj), and gaming (GameNow).
